step: 1. Heat oil in a pan. Add onions, garlic, and ginger. Saut√© until fragrant.
2. Add tomatoes and cook until they soften.
3. Stir in curry powder, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook for a few minutes.
4. Pour in coconut milk, stirring well.
5. Add your choice of protein or vegetables. Simmer until cooked through.
6. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with rice or naan.
